letsWorkTogether.title: Let's work
letsWorkTogether.subtitle: I am a Front-end developer based in Mayance, Germany. I enjoy helping designers and companies bring their ideas into real life. I am looking forward to continuing my developer career with a job in a junior web developer position.
letsWorkTogether.subtitle2: If you think I'd be a good match for your projects, contact me!

myWork.title: My work
myWork.subtitle: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
myWork.joinText: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
myWork.locoText: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
myWork.pokedexText: Based on the Pok√©API a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Got a problem to solve?
contact.description: Contact me through this form. I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
contact.name: Your name
